definitions.definition: A small ball placed in a container to cast a vote ; now, by extension , a piece of paper or card used for this purpose, or some other means used to signify a vote.
The process of voting , especially in secret ; a round of voting.
The total of all the votes cast in an election .
A list of candidates running for office ; a ticket .

main_definition: ( originally ) A small ball placed in a container to cast a vote ; now, by extension , a piece of paper or card used for this purpose, or some other means used to signify a vote.
secondary_definitions: The process of voting , especially in secret ; a round of voting.
The total of all the votes cast in an election .
( chiefly US ) A list of candidates running for office ; a ticket .
